short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count the number of open tabs and windows in the browser and display the data in a chart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visualize in a chart a record of the number of open tabs and windows in the browser, and keep track of the total number of tabs ever opened.

Tabs/Windows Stats is free and open source. Every feedback or suggestion is welcome.
If you find this extension useful, kindly consider leaving a rating.

────── Privacy Policy ──────
Tabs/Windows Stats does not monitor your browsing activity, including visited links or pages, and does not track or share any of your searches or filters. All permissions required for this extension are solely for the purpose of running the features provided as they are stated.
